mapper.update: update car_parts set isDelete='1' where id=#{id}
update parts_store set isDelete='1' where id=#{id}
mapper.select:
select c.id,c.name,c.type,c.partsNo,c.positions,c.description,ifnull(sum(p.surplusNum),0) surplusNum from car_parts c left join (select s.id,s.car_parts_id,ifnull(sum(s.num),0)-ifnull(sum(p.usedNum),0) surplusNum from huachengdb.parts_store s left JOIN huachengdb.project_parts p on s.id = p.car_partStoreId and (p.isdelete!='1' or p.isdelete is null) where (s.isDelete!='1' or s.isDelete is null) group by s.id) p on c.id = p.car_parts_id where c.isDelete!='1' or c.isDelete is null
and c.id = #{id}
and c.name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
and c.type like CONCAT('%',#{type},'%')
and c.partsNo like CONCAT('%',#{partsNo},'%')
and c.positions like CONCAT('%',#{positions},'%')
group by c.id

select s.id,p.id as p_id,p.type,p.name,p.partsNo,s.increase_Date increaseDate,s.num,s.unit_price unitPrice,s.sell_unit_price sellUnitPrice,s.description,s.surplusNum from (select ss.*,ss.num-ifnull(pp.num,0) surplusNum from huachengdb.parts_store ss left join (select ps.car_partStoreId,sum(ps.usedNum) num from huachengdb.project_parts ps where ps.isdelete!='1' or ps.isdelete is null group by ps.car_partStoreId) pp on ss.id = pp.car_partStoreId) s, car_parts p where (s.isDelete!='1' or s.isDelete is null) and s.car_parts_id=p.id and s.surplusNum!=0
and s.car_parts_id = #{part.id}
and p.name like concat('%',#{part.name},'%')
and p.type like concat('%',#{part.type},'%')
and s.description like CONCAT('%',#{description},'%')
